briefTitle: Ceftobiprole in the Treatment of Patients With Staphylococcus Aureus Bacteremia
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-blind, Multi-center Study to Establish the Efficacy and Safety of Ceftobiprole Medocaril Compared to Daptomycin in the Treatment of Staphylococcus Aureus Bacteremia, Including Infective Endocarditis
summary: The purpose of this study was to compare the efficacy and safety of ceftobiprole medocaril versus a comparator in the treatment of patients with complicated Staphylococcus aureus bacteremia (SAB).

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Patients With or Without Overall Success at the Post-treatment Evaluation (PTE) Visit
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: PTE visit on Day 70 (± 5 days) post-randomization
